website_summaries.verdict: This inexpensive mattress pad is a solid choice for those wanting a comfortable layer for the bed.
pros: Mattress pad is 40% more filled than other covers, making the product exceptionally comfortable
Customers enjoy the pad's near-perfect fit
Stays in place throughout the night
cons: Some customers find the product a little too thin

website_summaries.verdict: Primarily intended for protection, this pad doesn't offer significant support, but it fits most mattresses like a glove.
pros: Fits mattresses up to 16 inches deep, twin or queen
cons: It isn't very supportive, and it has a tendency to pill

customer_reviews.title: Is a deep pocket mattress pad --cover.
customer_reviews.text: It is a DEEP DEEP POCKET Mattress cover. IT DOES NOT FIT BEDS that are 10 inches--it is way too big for that--the question and answer part of the amazon page is wrong--it will not fit a 7 inch mattress. it just hangs and moves around on the bed. If you need a cover for a low profile mattress this is not your mattress cover. If you need a good mattress pad at a very good value--but have a very thick mattress then this is what you want.
customer_reviews.author: Fortheloveofjack

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect with lots of room. High-quality. No smell.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic. Absolutely the best cover I have ever purchased in my entire 66 years of living. No smell. And I have owned room rentals and have bought many mattress covers in my time but this by far surpasses every other brand on the market that I have tried. I put this mattress pad over a queen size pillow top mattress then I added a gel foam topper. It very easily covered everything and I was able to put the sides in without any difficulty. I highly recommend you try this product I know you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Florida

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress cover
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mattress cover. It's a basic one which is what I wanted. Not a vinyl waterproof or overly stuffed one, not a fan of thouse kinds they get too hot. This is nicely made good stitching thick enough to protect mattress and stays in place and fabric is soft. Very deep pocket I have it over a 13" mattress plus a 2" memory foam gel mattress topper and I have a terry cloth waterproof cover all under this great cover plenty of room. 100% satisfied I have been needing one for a long time so glad I got this
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Waste
customer_reviews.text: Have a queen size bed, and this fits horrible! We have to pull and tighten it up every night, and it still feels like humps under you while your trying to sleep. Not sure how it can say hypoallergenic when it won't stay on. Waste of money!!
customer_reviews.author: EMSgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good value!
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. This is not a high end pad, it's a little thin and not a whole bunch of padding but it fits well, is nice and stretchy and washes up well. I bought this for my guest room which only gets occasional use and I expect it to last a long time. It would fit a really deep mattress as well as a thinner one, this characteristic is important because I have all sorts of mattresses in my home! Overall, I would def. buy again.
customer_reviews.author: June Scholl

customer_reviews.title: Good find
customer_reviews.text: I was buying lots of bedding to set up a vacation home. I didn't want to spend a lot of money on a place that isn't our primary residence. I was also looking for a mattress pad that would work well on a thinner mattress (I believe ours are 8"). This pad met all those expectations very well! We've been using them for about a week now and they feel and look good, and don't slip around. Good product for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Shopper1234

customer_reviews.title: Possible bugs in product
customer_reviews.text: Found a bug inside the product possibly a bedbug, be wary when buying from here.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste money on this.
customer_reviews.text: Poorly made, hardly any padding in it. Was not stitched well around the corners. It won't last long.
customer_reviews.author: Susi

customer_reviews.title: Great product, excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad is nicer than one I paid twice as much for! It has real fabric on the back side, not the plasticky junk that falls apart in the dryer. It's also plenty deep for thick mattresses. I was so pleased that I bought a second one right away. Now I can put a clean mattress pad on the bed once a week, which will be so much better for our allergies. This came right on time, packaging was good, and I will do business with this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Just about had it

customer_reviews.title: it is not a pad
customer_reviews.text: This is not a pad, there is no padding involved... it is only a flat cover, It may be soft but the description lies, it is not 40% more padding, there is no padding.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Warmer than I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad fits and has cushioning. I thought it would help the memory foam mattress I just bought sleep a bit cooler. I believe it is not 100% cotton and that is why it doesn't release the heat like I wanted. For the money, it seems to be a good purchase. I will try for 100% cotton next time. I've only been using it for about a month, so I can't address long time durability.
customer_reviews.author: DN

customer_reviews.title: Hypoallergenic Mattress Cover
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress cover because it could be washed and dried, I didn't want extra loft but the top adds a nice feel over the mattress. I washed the mattress cover in hot water in my front loader and dried it and it came out like brand new. The price was was amazing for the product that was shipped to me. I have a regular queen size bed and after drying it still fits from corner to corner. The sides are substantial enough to hold my mattress pad in place, my mattress is a 8" but the sides could stretch over a 10-12". After one washing I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: This Hanna Kay Mattress Cover Is Great!
customer_reviews.text: I'am so please with this mattress cover, comfortably thick, quality made, deep skirting with elastic and deep corner pockets that actually snug under a 13" thick mattress. This cover is (NOT) package shrinked-wrapped that transforms into a cover 3x's its original size and becomes too big for your wash machine. Don't waist your money buying a $30 to $60 for a mattress cover. This Hanna Kay is moderately-priced and you will be pleased with the quality of this product. I'm not being compensated for this review- just delivering the TRUTH about this product for the Amazon family of shoppers.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Abott

customer_reviews.title: Love this mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad is really lovely. So many mattress pads do not have an actual fabric backing, instead they have a funky pressed fiber back that tears easily. The first thing i noticed when I received this pad is that it has a real fabric backing. The entire mattress pad is good quality. It fits comfortably on my thick foam mattress. I purchased a second one as a gift for my daughter and I am intending to purchase another one for the bed in my guest room.
customer_reviews.author: Maine girl

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nicely made mattress pad. It fits really well around the sides and the fabric is stretchy assuring a nice snug fit. The pad itself seems very well done. I have washed it 2x with no problems such as tearing, shrinking, etc. It stays put on the bed also where some seem to move around and bunch up under the sheets. I can't speak to the water resistance just that the bed does not seem warm from it and it's comfortable. Time will tell but so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: MJJJ

customer_reviews.title: Very cushy and soft
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mattress cover I have owned. It is very soft and gives a little boost to the mattress. FYI, this is a not a pad that is designed to give you inches on top of your mattress, this is a mattress cover. I ordered Queen and it fits very well with a little room without slipping. I needed 2 so I ordered 2 different ones and although the other was also nice, this was $5 more and the better of the 2. I am going to order this same brand in twin for another bed.
customer_reviews.author: Girl-k

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality/Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the mattress pad for an adjustable bed for my Mom. The order shipped quickly and arrived in very good condition. The mattress pad is very well made, soft and fit the mattress perfectly. It stay in place, even when raising the head and/or foot of the bed. It stays smooth and doesn't bunch or wrinkle under the sheets. Much nicer than other mattress pads we've purchased in the past for a higher price. Will absolutely order from this company again!
customer_reviews.author: JayT

customer_reviews.title: Protector, Not Pad
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an extra layer between you, your sheet and your mattress to protect it from body secretions, then this will do. If you're looking for additional padding for comfort, then look elsewhere. As other reviewers have noted, this pad is quite thin and does not add any additional comfort. It fits the mattress snugly, does not shift around from movement. It looks well constructed and may perhaps be durable, but won't know until I wash it. It'll do, but I would not purchase this pad again.
customer_reviews.author: JPH

customer_reviews.title: Great choice!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad was top-rated by a Website that reviewed a number of pads. Some were very expensive and they noted that at a moderate price, this was an outstanding choice. I agree. I washed it before using it - no problem at all in my average to small sized washing machine and dryer. Easy to put on and comfortable to use. I can't judge its durability of course, but I look forward to years of use.
customer_reviews.author: nb

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad is made of material that is 100% washable and dryable in a home machine. It is also hypoalergenic and cushy without being so bulky that it is difficult to get it in a washing machine or store it in a closet. The sides are also big enough to fit over a tall mattress and are not made of flimsy material that falls apart in a dryer. Great buy for a reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Fits Perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This does exactly what I wanted. It's a barrier between my puking cat and my new mattress. It is not waterproof, which I knew, but it's thick enough to do the job. I love the fabric sides and it easily fits my Serta Queen Pillowtop mattress. I bet I could even add a mattress topper and this would still fit over everything. I haven't washed it yet, but I hope it will hold up. If it doesn't, I'll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: T. A. WhiteTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Good protector
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the mattress protector just so that if the morning coffee got spilled on the bed then I wouldn't have to change the mattress but just to wash the mattress protector. I am happy with the purchase as when moving I was more comfortable selling my mattress knowing that it had been well protected all along. You barely notice anything is on your bed. Also keeps the sheets from slipping on the bed. Overall a very good investment
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: The mattress pad fit my deep mattress perfectly. I am not sure of the durability as I have washed it only once but for the price it would be economical to just purchase another if after several washes it doesn't hold up. The quality seems very good. Also I was impressed that I was contacted by the seller a few days after I received the mattress pad to make sure I was satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: CherylB

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, well made
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress protector to replace an old worn one. It is a nice quality. My old one had runs in the sides and was hard to keep on the mattress. This one has much sturdier sides and is plenty deep to cover a thicker mattress and the padding on top is even all the way to the edges of the mattress, which is a pillow top. It is well made. I can't assess its waterproof feature because we have not had occasion to know that. But it is comfortable and stays in place. I am pleased with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Bron Catalano

customer_reviews.title: I really do hate shopping online!
customer_reviews.text: You study the specs, you look at the pictures, you read the customer comments and in the end it's still such a shot in the dark to by anything online. This mattress pad will work but it is thinner than I had anticipated. It is a back up in case I need to strip the bed completely, I can make said bed up immediately. I do miss the luxury of going to a store and actually seeing, touching, feeling what I purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Paul L

customer_reviews.title: Good fit & Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: Good fit and good quality with elastic edges to keep attached to the underside of the mattress. Fabic is soft and it washes up nicely too! In would always suggest to wash it on the cold gentle cycle, this helps for the elastic and material to hold its shape much longer!
customer_reviews.author: AH-Rancho-Ca

customer_reviews.title: and I was disappointed. A waste of money to say the least
customer_reviews.text: In the past I've purchased mattress pads from other sellers, and I was disappointed. A waste of money to say the least. Did not stand up to the frequent wash due to kids and grand babies. I decided to try your brand and I must say I'm pleased with my purchase, so much so that I purchased pads for all the beds in my home. my recent purchase was for my parents who stated that they love the matters cover-pad as well.
customer_reviews.author: Pamie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I needed
customer_reviews.text: We recently purchased a new pillow top mattress which is very comfy, but expensive. I wanted a light weight, breathable, washable mattress cover to preserve the mattress as it cannot be turned. So this cover, with its light padding, is perfect to keep body sweat, etc., from getting into the mattress. It is not waterproof so it will not protect against spills. Fits mattress well. So far, I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: CBaz

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Mattress pad? Hahahahaha There is zero padding/cushion. You might as well just use a sheet and it probably wouldn't slide sideways like this does. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Hypoallergenic Quilted Stretch-to-Fit Mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: Hypoallergenic Quilted Stretch-to-Fit Mattress.Pad is a quality mattress pad. It washed beautifully and the sides are made of fabric and not the cheap netting that usually comes on pads. It fits my 11" mattress and will also fit thicker mattresses. I'm quite pleased with the quality of this mattress pad and highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Granny B

customer_reviews.title: Pilled Significantly
customer_reviews.text: After washing, using for one night's sleep (for guest) and then washing again, the fabric has pilled significantly. I did use flannel sheets, but I can't see how this would impact? I washed and tumbled dry. I will say that it is indeed "deep" and I purchased to use with an air mattress and 3-inch topper and it stays put. While the pilling doesn't impact use, I can't see this holding up for years to come and for that reason, I do not recommend. Per pictures you can see that the pills are attached to fabric and not fluff from other linens.
customer_reviews.author: FiveN's

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!!
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed!!! It's thinner, than I thought it would be, but I decided to keep it. Now, I washed it for the first time and it's totally falling apart. :-( waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: smart

customer_reviews.title: Fits great
customer_reviews.text: This is a great simple mattress protector, the padding is thin but enough to smooth out the tags on the mattress. The elastic has tons of extra space to accommodate a deeper mattress. It fits well and does the job it should.
customer_reviews.author: Quiet

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a mattress pad that wasn’t too thick for my new mattress. This is not too thick and not too thin. I really wanted it to protect my mattress because my husband is always cutting himself and I wanted no blood on my new mattress. This is thick enough that the mattress won’t get stained. Just enough to protect it. I can’t say if it’s waterproof. I didn’t buy it for that reason. And, it’s not crinkly, just smooth.
customer_reviews.author: flos

customer_reviews.title: it looks good
customer_reviews.text: I haven't put it on my sofa sleeper yet, because it's for my rental cabin in the mountains and I haven't had a chance to put it on. I'm a little concerned because the packaging didn't say for a sofa sleeper mattress anywhere on it, but my order does. The side stretchy part looks a little shorter than the average mattress pad, so I'm hoping it's not way too big for my sofa sleeper mattress. If it is, I'll just use it for a regular queen bed. I always need more mattress pads.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa F

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress pad for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice mattress pad for the price. Fits my 12-inch deep queen size mattress perfectly and stays in place. It would fit a deeper mattress easily. It doesn’t add any cushion or softness to speak of, so if that’s what you are looking for, this might not work for you. But if you want a good basic mattress pad that stays in place and is reasonably priced, this one is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: SnoopyJacksMom

customer_reviews.title: Washed in HOT water and Dried with High heat -- PERFECTLY
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe that any mattress cover could handle being washed and dried HOT and not shrink or become bumpy or melt (which has happened with "other" mattress covers). It fits my queen memory foam mattress perfectly and doesn't lump up or make creases. It does exactly what a mattress cover should. Provide protection and a little extra comfort between mattress and sheets!
customer_reviews.author: leeling

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I was looking for- a poly/cotton top that’s cool. The filling is nice, not just adequate. It also has a nice back to the top, actual fabric, not non woven material of some sort. And the sides stretch enough for the thickest mattress and cover it well. It’s warranted for ten years too. You will not be sorry you bought this mattress pad!
customer_reviews.author: Linda L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials and construction
customer_reviews.text: Due to the use of better quality materials, this mattress pad won't melt in the dryer unlike those from some other companies. (ahem...Bedsack by Perfect Fit | Classic Quilted Mattress Pad, Hypoallergenic & Stain Resistant) Mattress pads used to be made as well as this one. It's just a mattress pad to protect the mattress. If you don't expect cushioning this will certainly meet your needs.
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase a mattress pad on line. After reading most of the reviews, I decided to take a chance. So glad I did. This is a keeper. Opened it up, no smell. Since I a.ways wash things before I use them, I washed the pad. Came out beautiful. Once in the bed, it made my mattress more comfortable than ever. A great nights sleep every night. Would I buy it again? Absolutely.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kingsford

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, looks great
customer_reviews.text: Got cover a washed it before use. It came out clean and soft. It was easy to put on the mattress. Elastic was plenty long enough and made a tight fit. Quilted top was the exact dimensions of the mattress. This helped the sheets fit perfect. I think it will stay in place and not shift around or have corners come undone. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: J. McGeary

customer_reviews.title: Good quality mattress cover, excellent price
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for an inexpensive mattress cover for my bed and this one fits the bill. It fits my queen size bed perfectly. I don't like a heavily padded mattress cover; this one is actually heavier than ones I have had in the past, but not too heavy. Very comfortable to sleep on, does not make me feel too hot or too cold. Really it is just right. I have been using it for about 6 months and can verify that it washes beautifully when washed according to manufacturer instructions. I would definitely purchase another. It is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Judie

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress pad!
customer_reviews.text: Our Hanna Kay Hypoallergenic Quilted Stretch-to-Fit Mattress Pad lived up to its description. We are very pleased with it and know that our overnight guests will appreciate its comfort too. Especially like the deep pockets that accommodate several thicknesses of memory foam on the mattress. nice material as well. Many thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Sevison

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, exactly wht I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the fabric feels. It's bigger than my actual mattress so it kinda hangs over and doesn't look quite as crisp, but I think it's really good quality, soft. I use a fitted sheet over but this topper feels nicer than my sheets. It's also cool to the touch. Only downside is it takes long to dry but it's a king, so thats expected and I didn't want a thin mattress topper so its fine. I'm pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Nava

customer_reviews.title: No funky gauze
customer_reviews.text: We use these in our tiny motel. No gauze to put your fingers through. Product never shrinks (even though we wash them on hot, which you wouldn't need to in a home), always fits the bed well. The elastic doesn't seem to wear out, so the cover stays put and completely covers the sides of the mattress, and the whole surface is smooth sheeting instead of nasty stuff that sticks to your hands.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Hurt

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, but suited for thicker mattresses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress pad to replace an old one that was very plush and comfortable between the mattress and fitted sheet. I bought a relatively firm mattress topper, so I wanted something thinner, less expensive, easier to wash and as easy to put on. This one met all of those requirements, but there's one problem - it doesn't stay in place. My mattress with the topper is only 12" and this pad easily stretches to 18", so it's probably better suited for deeper mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: JJTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy on a Fantastic Item
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these mattress pads. I was first surprised by the quality of the work. These mattress pads are put together very well and should last for years. They were nicely packaged and easy to put on the beds. I doubt that I will need any more pads; but if I did, I would buy these again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: palral

customer_reviews.title: Wait & See...
customer_reviews.text: I received the package as promised and washed the mattress pad before putting it on the bed. This mattress pad suffers from the same issue as all the other mattress pads. See the picture. There is just not enough pad to fully cover the mattress. I havent been able to find one that does. It didn't get lumpy after being washed, HUGE PLUS !!!. Tonight will be the first time I'm sleeping on it and I will update the review after I see how it lasts through the night.
customer_reviews.author: MIM

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for a queen size bed. Very happy with the fit. Top fits the mattress perfectly and even with a deep mattress there is plenty of side fabric for a nice tight fit. I am happy with the construction, especially with the back. I have not laundered this yet, but judging by the material and the way it's made I have no doubt that it will hold up well, unlike others I have had that did not. Appears to be a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: rville

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because I needed a good mattress liner for my queen sized inflatable mattress. It fit the bill to a 'T'. I have slept on the mattress prior to having this liner, but my sleeping experience at that time wasn't worth writing home about. My sheets stayed in place, and I actually felt warmer because the cold material which the mattress is made of doesn't absorb body heat. I needed this because the cold nights in Washington during the summer months were keeping me awake. The mattress is used when I visit my daughter and her family and saves me the cost of renting a hotel room. Thank you for this product!
customer_reviews.author: Sleeper in Seattle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this mattress pad. The pad is all material, it does not have that cheap backing and sides that so many mattress pads have now. I have washed and dried it a couple of times with excellent results. Absolutely no shrinkage or shifting of the quilting on the top of the pad. The sides and pockets are a soft, almost silky material that fit over my mattress and topper with ease. The pad stays in place nicely. I highly recommend this pad, it is a well made product. I will be purchasing more for my guest beds.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable without interfering with sleep or noticeable negatives
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable without interfering with sleep or noticeable negatives, like noise or other things people sometimes complain about with mattress protestors. I am pleased with service and product - hope it holds up to washing over time or actually works if any accident. No reason to not expect best so far.
customer_reviews.author: W. Perry

customer_reviews.title: good quality mattress covers
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these mattress covers. I am very pleased with the quality and workmanship. The quilted top is plush enough, the material is soft on the top but strong on the sides. The fit was excellent for both mattresses. There is enough material to fit the deepness of the mattress and still tuck nicely under and not pull off even though my daughter is a very restless sleeper. I would purchase additional products from the company.
customer_reviews.author: WRMom

customer_reviews.title: Queen Size Hypoallergenic Quilted Mattress Pad
customer_reviews.text: I bought the hypoallergenic quilted mattress pad to accommodate the 2 inch memory foam topper which I ordered, but hasn't arrived just yet. Today, I did remove the mattress pad from the plastic pouch and noticed that it will certainly accommodate the topper nicely. It seems it will be of ample height for both the mattress plus the new topper. The fabric is cotton which will be cool, yet this product seems wrinkled - which won't really matter, but the polyester mattress pad that is being replaced does look nicer at first glance and does not wrinkle. I will review this product again after the memory foam topper is received and set up.
customer_reviews.author: Kailua Gram

customer_reviews.title: This fits and does what it is supposed to do-- protect my mattress
customer_reviews.text: I have had this cover on my queen-size bed for about two months now. It does not affect my sleep, but it protects the mattress and it doesn't bunch up or make problems. If you are looking for something to make your mattress feel softer, this may not be thick enough. But if you want protection, as I did, this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha W

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I did a lot of research before making a choice. I very much like the way the quilting is done. It stretches perfectly over a deep mattress that already has egg crate foam on it. I will definitely purchase this brand when I need another one.
customer_reviews.author: Sondra S. Hamelin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought the Olee 12inch Queen Mattress w/ Euro Top from Amazon a week ago and since I did not purchase the 13inch with the Gel, I thought I'd added the Hanna Kay Hypoallergenic Quilted Stretch-to-Fit Mattress Pad." No only do I feel like it adds an additional layer to my already comfortable mattress, but I feel like I am on a "cloud." I have slept amazing during this pandemic, so I highly recommend the Hanna Kay Hypoallergenic Quilted Stretch-to-Fit Mattress Pad at a perfect price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No Fluff
customer_reviews.text: Not cushy nor plush by any means, but smooths out a quilt stitched mattress. A 10 YEAR warranty covers manufacturing material defects only, not "normal" wear, so it likely will never be used after a few months. Fulfilling ALL claim requirements also make it impractical.
customer_reviews.author: BSchauerte

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE: Cannot return
customer_reviews.text: The description for this product is misleading, I assumed it would provide some padding as a mattress pad which it offers none of. BUYER BEWARE, you cannot return this product. I thought all prime items were covered with their 30 day return policy, but this is inaccurate. I am utterly disappointed with both the product and the fact that I cannot return the item which has never been used.
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine Reinstein

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase.
customer_reviews.text: So this is actually my second purchase of this product, I liked the first one so much that when I needed a second one for the new bed I didn't hesitate to buy a second one. This comes in great shape, washes well and holds up. I've had the first one for 4 years with no issues. :)
customer_reviews.author: L-Gecko

customer_reviews.title: Finally, Perfection in a Mattress Pad!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new quilted mattress pad. It looks great, it fits great, and best of all, it feels great. This pad replaced not one, but two previously purchased pads that didn't fit right. One just keep slipping all over the mattress every time I laid down and the other kept bunching up in an uncomfortable way every time I rolled over making my sleep uncomfortable as well. This pad fits tightly, stays in place and makes my sleep... a dream! It even gives an attractive quilt-like pattern to my fitted sheet. I could not be happier with this purchase and the sellers, Brian and Hanna Kay. Thanks so much!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Kaminski

customer_reviews.title: It will be good on the spare bed but need to find one ...
customer_reviews.text: got the product on time but it was a little flimsy for compared to what I thought I was getting. It will be good on the spare bed but need to find one locally so I can see what I am getting before I purchase.
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great mattress pad!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mattress pad along with the three inch gel mattress topper. The pad adds an extra layer of softness, fits the topper and my queen sized mattress beautifully, and already has been washed once-with great results. I am very pleased with it and highly recommend the pad.
customer_reviews.author: Marianjm

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad is exactly what I needed. Not too thin and not too puffy either. Just the right amount of padding for a little extra added comfort on a firm mattress. I washed it before using and had no problems with the filling getting bunched or not drying properly. What a great deal...would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: krista

customer_reviews.title: This has great stretch, no worry about this coming off the mattress no matter what size  mattress you have.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful stretch, you don't have to worry about this coming up from your mattress. Very well made. I washed it before I put it on the bed and it came out looking like new. The mattress I am using this on is 8 inches thick with no worry about this coming off. This will fit a mattress much thicker than mine with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad fits beautifully. I also love the washing instructions and having washed it before use it came out as though right out of the package. I’m very happy with my choice. When shopping at a brick and mortar store all I could find were heated pads. Nothing I wanted. So glad I found exactly what I was looking for on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: M. Burlew

customer_reviews.title: Has the same issue as all covers- they make you ...
customer_reviews.text: Has the same issue as all covers- they make you sweat! This one provided no relief - even after adding two bed sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Cambullrun

customer_reviews.title: Perfect mattress protector.
customer_reviews.text: This mattress protector is perfect. It’s soft, quiet and very comfortable. The best part is it fits my mattress. I have a 13 inch mattress with a 4 inch mattress topper and it is a perfect fit! I do not need a waterproof protector and most are noisy when you move and this one is soft and quiet so you get a better nights rest.
customer_reviews.author: fs55

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this mattress pad. It has deep enough pockets to cover my mattress and 3 inch topper. The construction looks sturdy and it survived laundering without any problems. It is comfortable to sleep on and I am happy to recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: GDH

customer_reviews.title: More of a fitted sheet than a mattress pad.
customer_reviews.text: This is not so much a mattress pad but more like a fitted sheet. There is very little padding involved. However, it is a very nice alternative to a standard fitted sheet. Seems to collect dust/animal hair very easily and holds static.
customer_reviews.author: Devon G.

customer_reviews.title: does as promised....
customer_reviews.text: fits great on my Q mattress., no chemical smells..have not owned long enough to add anything further.
customer_reviews.author: Luckydwg

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a replacement mattress pad/cover because ours was worn out. This one arrived well packed and quickly. It was very reasonably priced, but came with a guarantee and looks like a quality product. It went on the bed nicely with plenty of extra for an even deeper mattress, no tugging and pulling. It's very soft and plush. I always wash new products and it came out of the laundry beautifully! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: windinsj

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: I had read several reviews before purchasing and made my own judgement. I can say my product had absolutely no smell to it. It fit perfectly to my mattress, and was made of higher quality than other mattress pads I have owned before. I would highly recommend this mattress pad and I can say I will be buying from this company again. Great value for the quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Always go with the USA!
customer_reviews.text: The pad was as advertised. It washed up perfectly. It was very easy to stretch over the mattress and it fits very securely. The side panels are sturdy or strong enough that you won't put you fingers through when you stretch it across the mattress. Our mattress is 14 inches. I would highly recommend it and the seller!
customer_reviews.author: Luv 2 Read

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the air mattress
customer_reviews.text: This mattress pad fit perfectly. It help provide support for the air bed which we found astonishingly comfortable. I would recommend this USA product for anyone who needs a pad for their air mattress. The edges worked just fine and the length was generous and just right. I would purchase from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: Drkarjck

customer_reviews.title: This is the best quality mattress cover I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe the quality of this cover for the price. I paid $100 for one from the mall and it was junk. I have washed and dried my first cover every week for a year and it still looks like new and still has a nice loft to the quilting.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality mattress cover, fits perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: This product has a very nice texture. I'm using this directly on a queen size mattress, and it's very comfortable all by itself. I have an eight inch tall mattress, and this product completely covers the sides with six inches of overlap on the bottom. It is large enough that you can add padding under the cover if you wish, although I find it unnecessary. It does not slide around at all once installed and the tag says it is machine washable, which is convenient. Great mattress cover, highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My only complaint - and it will be a plus for most - is that it's very nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: This is everything you could want in a mattress cover. My only complaint - and it will be a plus for most - is that it's very nice and warm. I prefer to be cooler during sleep, but this isn't enveloping you in ghastly, suffocating warmth like some. It's very soft and comfortable, has more than enough depth for any conceivable mattress, it's exactly sized, unlike some, and I'd recommend it for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: L. P. Troll

customer_reviews.title: Helps make my sheets fit better
customer_reviews.text: I was having problems with my previous mattress pad bunching up (I paid ALOT more for it too) and so I tried going without and my sheets would not stay put. I ended up having to remake the bed essentially from scratch every single morning. Since I've had this mattress pad, my sheets stay put, there's no more bunching ... I can't recommend this enough. Thank you for making a great, affordable product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked well for us.
customer_reviews.text: A mattress cover it is... Fits perfect and washed up great. Our mattress is 11.5 inches deep and this cover stays put. No moving or bunching. It provides no extra padding and allows us to feel the new mattress while protecting it.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for out-of-town family so I do not have personal experience. That is why I have given it 4 stars. My family members are very pleased with the mattress cover. It arrived in excellent condition, fits perfectly and is comfortable to sleep on. I would order it again.
customer_reviews.author: B. May

customer_reviews.title: Really love this cover
customer_reviews.text: Really love this cover. it was shipped on time actually arrived early. It fit perfectly and snugly to the mattress. The material feels good and well made. I would definitely recommend. Would suggest a barrier such as a piece of bubble wrap on top in packaging. Myself not thinking what was inside I used a sharp knife to open and put a small cut through the top. But this was my error!! I patched it and is good as new. Again I would recommend this quilted cover.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wostbrock

customer_reviews.title: Good and bad
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the waterproof material is fine, but it does mot stay anchored on my bed for long, and i am constantly having to put it on over and over on each corner, because it drags easily and flips up a lot, exposing the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Lolley Pinkerton

customer_reviews.title: Installed today - fits nicely, looks good
customer_reviews.text: Just put this on the new mattress today and we are happy with our choice of mattress covers. This one has minimal extra "cushion" which was just what we wanted. We have a 120 day Sleep Guarantee on the mattress and we want to make sure this is the correct one for us... don't want a lot of extra stuff on top to mask support or confuse the issue. It looks sturdy and the elastic should hold it in place well.
customer_reviews.author: PoeFan

customer_reviews.title: This product is excellent
customer_reviews.text: This was ordered to replace a mattress cover that kept sliding off and refused to take a firm hold on our not-extra-deep mattress. It does the job perfectly - a firm hold, no slipping, even on a normal-sized mattress.
customer_reviews.author: E. Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Is NOT waterproof. Child had a small accident and it leaked straight through to the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: T. Kuczynski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Opened and ran through a quick wash rinse and dry cycle as I do with all fabric items. Came out soft and looking good. Great quality and easily stretched over deep mattress and 3 inch memory foam pad. Was not overly quilted, which was exactly what we wanted. Great price. Support this independent Amazon seller and buy from them, you'll be happy with this item!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Hames

customer_reviews.title: Looks and fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The mattress cover fits perfectly on my Queen Casper mattress. It feels very nice, too. I was afraid it may be too warm for the tropic weather but so far, so good. I washed it before fitting it on the mattress. It didn't shrink. The cover is nicely sewn and looks good.
customer_reviews.author: D/Hawaii

customer_reviews.title: Excellent mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: This is a good quality mattress pad with nice deep pockets and a good amount of padding in the base. The quality and durability are excellent. This is my second one of the Hanna Kay mattress pads. I have purchased other brands and I liked this one the best, so when I wanted to put a new pad on another bed, this was my choice. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: bjski

customer_reviews.title: mattress pad has a great fit
customer_reviews.text: I bought this mattress pad for my queen size mattress. My mattress is approximately 11" deep and this pad stretched over it snugly. The quality of the materials and workmanship seems great, but as I have only had it a week, I can't comment on it's durability. My expectation is that I would give it 5 stars for durability in the months to come. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Knight

customer_reviews.title: High quality at affordable prices
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with the quality of this product and at such an affordable price. It washed up easily and fits over our queen size mattress perfectly. I am happy that I no longer have to contend with the problem of the corners of my mattress pad pulling off from the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: WENDY KAY

customer_reviews.title: Note ....it’s basic..
customer_reviews.text: To be fair I read the stars review and not the info. If you want a basic mattress topper/actual cover over the mattress aka another sheet then this will do the job. It does not have any additional padding or memory form or any bells or whistles.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth M.

customer_reviews.title: Put it on and forget about it, like all mattress toppers should be
customer_reviews.text: You know your topper is awesome when you put it on your bed and forget about it. Which is what we did. We have had this for over two months, so it works so far! No complaints - it's pretty simple.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Gerlach Puckett

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful and affordable!
customer_reviews.text: This mattress topper is so soft and has added just enough extra cushion to make sleeping on my mattress that much better. It goes on easily over my 12" mattress and fits securely with no movement and adjustment. I shall be ordering another one as a gift! 100% recommended. So happy to have been able to support a small American business and even more happy that this product is of great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: The very best Mattress Pad
customer_reviews.text: We have a very thick mattress. Have had trouble finding a pad that has deep enough sides to stay on and not slip up. This one did the trick. Highly recommend it. The best we have found. Will be getting another for a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Doe7

customer_reviews.title: Not wide enough for a queen size mattress.
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn't buy this again. It's made for a taller mattress (mine is only 10") and you have to constantly keep tucking it in. The material on the sides is very flimsy. As for the top part, I have a standard queen size and the width of the pad doesn't cover the top of my mattress, so there is about an inch on each side of the bed that isn't covered by the pad.
customer_reviews.author: LucyLou

customer_reviews.title: It's very breathable and it also adds a bit of plushness which makes the futon mattress more comfortable. However this by itself
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for a queen sized futon. I'm using it over a vinyl cover, which obviously isn't breathable at all and sweating becomes an issue. With this mattress pad, sweating is not a problem anymore. It's very breathable and it also adds a bit of plushness which makes the futon mattress more comfortable. However this by itself doesn't make the futon as comfortable as it needs to be. I'm also getting a memory foam topper to use underneath this and I think the combination of the two will be perfect.
customer_reviews.author: SSRM

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son’s new, queen bed (age 18). We purchased a 10 inch mattress and it fit over the mattress edges easily and the padding went edge to edge. I was pleasantly surprised with the quality and feel. I can’t give reviews for durability, or easiness to clean since we just got it and that is the only reason I gave it 4 stars rather than 5. I have high hopes as we don’t generally wash the pad as often as the sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Tasha G. Alsup

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased a memory foam mattress on amazon The reviews said it was a great made in America mattress but the mattress cover on it wasn't so nice. So I found this queen sized made in America cover. So far so good and bed is comfy. Great service arrived as promised and fits my ugly but awesome bed BUY AMERICAN made products. Not only are they made well but they keep Americans working .Great for you ,great for the economy ...
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: That good good 🤙🏻
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! It was used on an air mattress for a surprise indoor movie night for my girlfriend's bday, and it is amazing! Its comfy, cozy and adds a little more padding. I'm a heavy sweater at night also, and this is so easy to clean if I ever do because it helps keep me pretty cool. Good stuff 🤙🏻
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Taylor Long

product_meta.title: Hanna Kay Hypoallergenic Quilted Stretch-to-Fit Mattress Pad, 10 Year Warranty-Clyne Collection (Queen)
feature_bullets: REAL COMFORT | 40% MORE FILL THAN AVERAGE: Ready for that nap? At the end of your day, you want to feel nothing but comfort between you and your bed. Hanna Kay mattress pads come stuffed with 40% more filling than other pads on the market, crafted from luxury-quality hypoallergenic materials to keep even sensitive sinuses and heads clear.

KEEP COOL WITH OUR UNIQUE POLY-COTTON BLEND: Get the mattress pad that’s known for its breathability. Unlike fully polyester or plastic pads, Hanna Kay provides protection and breathability, to keep your sleep nice and cool.

NO SPECIAL WASHING INSTRUCTIONS, NO BUNCHING: We designed our premium hypoallergenic mattress pad to fit your lifestyle—which means no special washing instructions needed. And our pad’s diamond stitching provides comfort and durability while preventing material bunching in the wash.

THE PERFECT FIT ... WITH STRETCH-TO-FIT TECHNOLOGY: Hanna Kay always brings comfort and ease to our products. The knitted polyester sides slip over mattresses up to 16 inches deep with zero fuss, giving you a perfect fit that stays put.

10-YEAR “SHIELD IT” GUARANTEE: We love our customers and we work hard for you to love us, too. If for any reason you stop loving your Hanna Kay mattress pad, though, get in touch: we’ll return it for a 100% no-questions refund.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars7,297 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
